long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs Extension is a versatile browser extension that simplifies sharing tabs and bookmarks across devices(from PC to PC or PC to Mobile), with friends and colleagues. Effortlessly send URLs to others with the click of a button, eliminating the need for copy-pasting or complex sign-ins. Experience seamless browsing by seamlessly shifting tabs and bookmarks between computers and mobile devices. With user privacy in mind, Tabs Extension operates securely without requiring any account login, ensuring confidentiality. Enjoy additional save with date feature like tab and bookmark backup and an intuitive interface. Enhance your browsing experience and collaboration with Tabs Extension. Download now to stay connected and productive. Use this addon to share your tabs and bookmarks.
